Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price! Grab one right away!
Reviews.Author: Vikas
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera recently, as a backup camera to use when I don't feel like lugging around my D-SLR. I am amazed by its performance. For such small size, it delivers tremendously.Pros:- I picked up the red one. I like that it comes in different colors.- It is so small and compact that it can fit comfortably and snugly even in the smallest of pockets. I can take it to any place where I want to hang out and cannot carry my D-SLR. It is just like a cellphone.- Amazing and crisp 16MP picture quality. Smart mode works pretty well recognizing scenes. More so, the numerous scene modes work beautifully. It also has excellent wide angle coverage for landscapes. I am not much of a 'zoom' or 'crop' person, so 5X zoom is pretty neat for me.- 720p video shoots some very nice quality videos.- Lot of fun effects in both camera and video modes that you can explore and enjoy.- Love the panorama mode.- Battery lasts long enough for an occasion or a day out. I have not counted the shots on a single charge, however I have never run out of battery before I returned home.- makes an excellent camera for beginners. Very intuitive and has help messages to work your way around different functions.Cons:- None so far. I am loving it.This is an amazing performer and a beautiful looking camera and it is hard to find a camera with similar specs around the same price point. I would suggest to grab one while the deal lasts. Happy Holidays!

Reviews.Title: Nice piont and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Kinghf10
Reviews.Content: At first I was worried about the quality of this camera. The pictures were blurred no matter how still I held it; the shutter speed was extremely slow.Don't worry the camera is great. The factory pre-set is a slow shutter speed with a long processing to finish the photo. Just go into the camera's menu and set the auto function if you expect to use it in the standard aim and fire way. The pictures are acutally pretty nice.  Plus the small size makes it easy to carry.*You need a MICRO SD memory card for this camera*

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good for the Value
Reviews.Author: J. Kramer
Reviews.Content: Compared to other small digital cameras this Samsung does a great job for the money. I bought it as a present for my 14 year old niece and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Gary W. Darby
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great buy, but I ordered a black one and I got a red one... still, it's a good camera and the battery life is very good.  It's easy to use, doesn't take up much room in your pocket, and takes very good photos.  I looked up spare batteries on Amazon and found them relatively cheap.  I suggest you get at least one backup battery if you are going on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Tracy Bennett
Reviews.Content: Love this Camera just was I was looking for. It's small,lite and take good pictures too. Fast shipping and cheap price.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Veronica C. Billing
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for.  Keep it in my bag all the time and whip it out whenever I want.  Only negative is opening for batteries and card is sometimes hard to open and close.  But the pictures are great and that's what counts.

Reviews.Title: It is pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Judith S. Hammett "Mom to Many"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as my granddaughter had one and I like the way the pictures looked that she took with hers.  It is a little complicated to use and the instructions that came with it do not really explain how to use it.  Not sure I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Product quality is below standard
Reviews.Author: Eric W. Brooks
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box, this camera did not perform as it should. The zoom lens goes to full zoom and there is no way to control it. You can not shoot a movie with it, and the menu button works sometimes and not at other times.When the service/support was called we got some person with such a thick accent that we could not understand them. all in all this was a very poor buying experience.

Reviews.Title: Too good to be true, really worth the money
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect camera for my. It has a lot of features for just a begginer like me, is compact and the zoom feature really impressed me, because it still has very good quality in maximal zoom. In a occasion i was aiming for take a pic at maximum zoom , and the image looked so poor, but when i took the picture and saw the pic taken it looked in a too good quality.Overall the camera enhance the quality and appearance of pics(mainly the people skin).I bought it in Target but im sure from Amazon is evenly good. I really like this camera, 100% HIGHLY recomended.

Reviews.Title: Old-looking / Worthless / Defective
Reviews.Author: MISS ASF
Reviews.Content: Camera itself looked old and plain ugly upon receipt although description indicated as new.  Not a slight chance to ship it back to seller as it arrived shortly before my scheduled international flight.  Intentionally bought it for the specific travel but in only less than a week of minimal use and it's already malfunctioning!!!  All pictures were so disappointingly blurry since day one!!!  Shutter button got stuck during a family reunion...grrrrr!!!  Definitely unacceptable!!!!!  Wish I could get my money back but ran out of time to do so.  Extremely mad, sad, regretful, frustrated, & entirely dissatisfied!!!  First time to purchase a Samsung Digital Camera and surely will be the last one too!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Samsung if you expect repair service
Reviews.Author: CDC
Reviews.Content: Within 1 year the camera stopped taking a charge. That is where the troubles began.I called Samsung for warranty repair and went through all their prompts for digital cameras but got sent to the Blue-ray department every time. I then had to get transferred to the camera department.I called 5 times but every single time the Samsung operator hung up on me. Five times is no "accident". The fifth, and last, time I asked to speak with a manager. That made no difference. He put me on hold for 20 minutes and then hung up on me.So I was forced to write to Consumer Affairs in New Jersey. Almost 2 month later, Samsung finally accepted me returning the camera for warranty repair, But they did not fix it. Instead they sent back a new battery and charging cord. The camera still does not take a charge.All this for an $80 camera. Might as well have thrown it in the trash when it stopped working. Or better yet never bought a Samsung product in the first place. I was looking into their netbooks but after this experience, I will never buy anything from Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Misleading color
Reviews.Author: CoffinSupply "CoffinSupply"
Reviews.Content: Takes grainy pictures no matter how still I hold it. Color is pink on the front , I mean why they call it red ? Only 40% is red. Takes horrible pictures because you can easily tell it was taken with cheap camera, so If you want to preserve your pictures don't buy cheap cameras. I got it for $34 so I will keep it for emergency use in my cars glove compartment.

Reviews.Title: Got it
Reviews.Author: koffi aluka
Reviews.Content: It was not the camera I was expecting to buy. But, that's fine. I'll keep it. I can send it to someone as a gift.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Rama Bagus Perkasa
Reviews.Content: i got the camera faster than it should be, everything in camera is run very well, i dont need touch screen on it, so im totally fine with the camera

Reviews.Title: It is a nice looking camera and takes good videos and pictures
Reviews.Author: Deepti
Reviews.Content: ....however mine seems to have a problem every now and then when i take a picture the shutter goes really slow and then the camera will say capturing then processing and when the picture finally shows up it blurry and unfocused. I have no idea why this happens but their were pictures i would have liked to take but was unable to because of this glitch also it seems to take a double picture right after you take the first one and no matter what setting i put it on i always end up with a blurry or wierd picture of my hand or feet right after i take a picture i want. also my camera is two different colors the back is red and the front is pink i dont really mind because im a girl and i like both colors but im pretty sure if a guy was buing this and it happened he wouldn't be to happy.

Reviews.Title: Had the camera 2 years-battery died and won't come out
Reviews.Author: A reader
Reviews.Content: I had this camera over 2 years.  During the time I had it, I really had no issues with it-I kept it in great shape.  However, recently, the camera has not been holding a charge so I went to take out the battery.  Unfortunately, the battery will no longer come out-it is stuck.  For twice the price of a replacement battery, I might as well get a new camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 MP CCD sensor
5x Optical zoom
2.7-Inch LCD (QVGA) screen
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST66 16 MP Compact Digital Camera - Silver (EC-ST66ZZBPSUS)
